title: Gakuen Heaven (HIGURI Yuu) Manga
description:
Keita ItouÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½a boy with no special qualities other than superb luckÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½suddenly receives an acceptance letter from the renowned all-boys 
Bell Liberty Academy (a.k.a. BL Academy). Attracted by the schoolÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s prestige, he decides to attend. However, on the day of his transfer, 
he gets into a freakish traffic accident. Luckily, no one is injured...but the incident arouses the attention of both the Student CouncilÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s 
president, Tetsuya Niwa (a.k.a. the king), as well as the head of the Budget Council, Kaoru Saiyonji (a.k.a. the queen).

Keita works to discover the reasons behind his invitation to such a remarkable school, struggles to find his niche among such brilliant 
and beautiful young men, and attempts to win the school-wide contest that will grant his wish of permanent placement at BL Academy! 
Along the way, he develops intense relationships with the rest of the hunky characters: clever Naruse, the captain of the tennis club; 
pensive Shinomiya, the captain of the archery club; sensitive Iwai, the captain of the art club; spunky Taki, a cyclist; cold and calculating
Nakajima, the vice president of the Student Council; genius computer programmer, Shichijo; the childlike teacher, Umino, and the 
friendly but mysterious classmate, Kazuki Endou.

Will he discover the mystery of his friend, Kazuki Endou?

Oh for all of you have seen the Anime warning Keita ends up with a different guy.
